Lord of Longbow Hall058824zxeitowv6lmh0g7w6mnywckz849f2h1546142014-07-24T21:59:11ZCorneliusAgrippa5753603'''Lord of Longbow Hall''' is a title held by the ruler of the keep [[Longbow Hall]] and its surrounding lands in [[the Vale]]. The title is traditionally held by a member of [[House Hunter]]. The present Lord of Longbow Hall is [[Eon Hunter]].
[[Category:Titles]]
